# StratiFi Technologies Inc

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | https://www.stratifi.com/ |
| **Category** | AI Platform for Wealth Management, Risk Analysis & Proposal Generation |
| **Description** | StratiFi is an AI-powered wealth management platform that provides risk profiling, investment proposal generation, and portfolio analysis tools for financial advisors. The platform uses proprietary PRISM Rating technology to analyze portfolio risk and generate compliance-ready investment policy statements (IPS) in under 5 minutes. |

## Pricing

| Tier | Price | Features |
|------|-------|----------|
| **Basic/Professional** | Custom Quote | Core risk analysis, portfolio reporting, basic integrations |
| **Enterprise** | Custom Quote | Full platform access, advanced integrations, custom workflows, API access |

**Notes:** Pricing is not publicly listed on the website. StratiFi uses a custom quote model based on firm size, number of advisors, and feature requirements. Contact sales for specific pricing.

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- PRISM Rating technology for risk analysis
- Portfolio risk assessment and visualization
- Investment proposal generation
- Client risk profiling questionnaire
- Compliance-ready documentation
- Real-time portfolio monitoring

### Advanced Features
- AI-powered risk scoring
- Automated IPS generation (under 5 minutes)
- Multi-custodian portfolio aggregation
- Compliance audit preparation
- Prospect meeting tools
- Custom proposal templates

### Enterprise-Only Features
- White-label capabilities
- Custom integrations
- API access for custom workflows
- Dedicated support and onboarding
- Multi-advisor firm management

### Limitations
- Pricing not publicly available (requires sales consultation)
- Limited information on free trial availability
- Some integrations may require additional setup fees

## Add-On Products & Services

### StratiFi PRISM
**What it does:** Proprietary risk analysis technology that provides portfolio risk scoring and analysis

**Key Features:**
- Factor-based risk analysis
- Upside/downside potential differentiation
- Portfolio stress testing
- Risk-adjusted return analysis

**Pricing:** Custom quote (included in platform)

**Use Cases:** Risk profiling, investment analysis, client reporting

---

### StratiFi ComplianceIQ
**What it does:** Surveillance system for compliance monitoring across advisory practices

**Key Features:**
- Real-time compliance monitoring
- Automated alerts and notifications
- Multi-advisor oversight
- Compliance documentation storage

**Pricing:** Custom quote (included in enterprise tier)

**Use Cases:** RIA compliance, multi-advisor firm oversight

---

### StratiFi IPS Generation
**What it does:** Automated Investment Policy Statement creation tool

**Key Features:**
- Template-based IPS creation
- Customizable to firm requirements
- Digital signatures
- Client portal integration

**Pricing:** Custom quote (included in platform)

**Use Cases:** New client onboarding, compliance documentation

---

### StratiFi API
**What it does:** REST API for custom integrations and workflows

**Key Features:**
- RESTful API endpoints
- Webhook support
- Documentation and SDKs
- OAuth 2.0 authentication

**Pricing:** Custom quote (enterprise tier only)

**Use Cases:** Custom integrations, automated workflows, data synchronization

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 25+ documented integrations (from help documentation)

## Key Integrations

### Integration 1: Wealthbox CRM
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | Bi-directional |
| **What it does** | Syncs client data, portfolio information, and risk profiles between StratiFi and Wealthbox CRM |
| **Data synced** | Client profiles, portfolio holdings, risk scores, meeting notes, compliance documents |
| **Setup complexity** | Easy (OAuth-based, self-service) |
| **Limitations** | Requires Wealthbox subscription; initial sync may take 15-30 minutes for large firms |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/stratifi-wealthbox-crm |

### Integration 2: Redtail CRM
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | Bi-directional |
| **What it does** | Integrates portfolio risk analysis and proposal generation with Redtail CRM |
| **Data synced** | Client data, portfolios, risk assessments, proposals, compliance documents |
| **Setup complexity** | Easy (OAuth-based, self-service) |
| **Limitations** | Requires Redtail CRM subscription; limited to standard Redtail fields |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/stratifi-redtail-integration |

### Integration 3: Black Diamond
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | One-way (from Black Diamond to StratiFi) |
| **What it does** | Imports portfolio data from Black Diamond for risk analysis and proposal generation |
| **Data synced** | Portfolio holdings, account values, positions, performance data |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium (API credentials required) |
| **Limitations** | Read-only access; changes must be made in Black Diamond |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/stratifi-black-diamond-integration |

### Integration 4: Addepar
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | One-way (from Addepar to StratiFi) |
| **What it does** | Imports portfolio data from Addepar for risk analysis and compliance documentation |
| **Data synced** | Portfolio holdings, account values, positions, allocation data |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium (API credentials required) |
| **Limitations** | Read-only access; complex data structures may require mapping |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/stratifi-addepar-integration |

### Integration 5: Orion
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | Bi-directional |
| **What it does** | Syncs portfolio data, risk scores, and reporting between StratiFi and Orion |
| **Data synced** | Portfolio holdings, risk assessments, reporting data, client communications |
| **Setup complexity** | Easy (OAuth-based, self-service) |
| **Limitations** | Requires Orion subscription; some advanced features may require Orion Enterprise |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/stratifi-orion-integration |

### Integration 6: Advyzon
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | Bi-directional |
| **What it does** | Integrates risk profiling and portfolio analysis with Advyzon platform |
| **Data synced** | Client data, portfolios, risk scores, investment proposals |
| **Setup complexity** | Easy (OAuth-based, self-service) |
| **Limitations** | Requires Advyzon subscription |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/advyzon-stratifi |

### Integration 7: MoneyGuidePro
| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Type** | Native |
| **Direction** | Bi-directional |
| **What it does** | Integrates financial planning data with risk analysis and proposal generation |
| **Data synced** | Client goals, financial plans, risk tolerance, scenario analysis |
| **Setup complexity** | Medium (API-based, may require configuration) |
| **Limitations** | Requires MoneyGuidePro subscription; data mapping may be required |
| **Documentation** | https://help.stratifi.com/stratifi-moneyguide-integration |

## API & Developer Info

### API Availability
- **API Type:** RESTful API
- **Authentication:** OAuth 2.0
- **Rate Limits:** Custom based on tier (contact sales)
- **Documentation:** Available for Enterprise tier customers

### Developer Resources
- **API Documentation:** Available upon request (Enterprise tier)
- **SDKs:** .NET, Java (planned)
- **Webhook Events:** Portfolio updates, risk changes, compliance alerts
- **Integration Support:** Dedicated technical support for Enterprise customers

### API Endpoints (Examples)
- Portfolio data retrieval
- Risk score updates
- Client profile management
- Proposal generation
- Compliance document creation

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Award-Winning Platform:** 3x T3 All-Star Software, 2x WealthManagement.com Awards winner
2. **Fast IPS Generation:** Can create investment policy statements in under 5 minutes
3. **Proven ROI:** Customer reports of hitting AUM goals in 3 months and closing $5M in new AUM in a month
4. **High Customer Satisfaction:** 9/10 customer satisfaction rating
5. **Large Platform Assets:** $100B+ in platform assets, battle-tested for compliance audits
6. **Time Savings:** Saves 5 hours per proposal compared to manual process
7. **Risk Clarity:** Provides realistic risk tolerance assessments and clear client communication
8. **Compliance Ready:** Built for compliance audits and prospect meetings

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Limited Pricing Transparency:** Pricing not publicly available, requires sales consultation
2. **Enterprise Focus:** Some features only available at Enterprise tier
3. **Learning Curve:** Advanced features may require training
4. **Integration Complexity:** Some third-party integrations may require technical setup
5. **No Free Trial Information:** Website doesn't clearly state free trial availability

### Alternatives with Brief Comparisons
| Alternative | Comparison |
|-------------|------------|
| **Riskalyze** | Similar risk analysis focus, but StratiFi has stronger proposal generation and IPS creation |
| **AdvisorEngine** | Broader advisor workflow, but StratiFi is more focused on risk and proposals |
| **Morningstar ByAllAccounts** | Better data aggregation, but StratiFi has stronger risk analysis |
| **FinaMetrica** | Similar risk profiling, but StratiFi has more modern UI and better integrations |

### Use Cases: "Ideal For"
- **Independent RIA firms** looking for risk profiling and proposal generation
- **Multi-advisor practices** needing compliance oversight and standardization
- **Firms using Wealthbox or Redtail CRM** who need integrated risk analysis
- **Advisors who generate frequent investment proposals** and need time savings
- **RIAs preparing for compliance audits** and need documentation tools
- **Firms looking to improve client communication** about portfolio risk

### Use Cases: "Not Ideal For"
- **Large institutional firms** needing highly customized solutions (may require more customization)
- **Firms not using supported CRMs** (limited CRM integration without custom work)
- **Small solo practices** on tight budgets (pricing may be prohibitive)
- **Firms needing extensive third-party integrations** beyond the supported list
- **Firms requiring mobile-first experience** (desktop-focused platform)

### Key Differentiators (5 items)
1. **PRISM Rating Technology:** Proprietary risk scoring system with factor-based analysis
2. **Sub-5-Minute IPS Generation:** Unmatched speed in creating compliance-ready documentation
3. **AUM Growth Success:** Documented cases of $5M+ AUM growth in single month
4. **Compliance-First Design:** Built specifically for RIA compliance and audit preparation
5. **AI-Powered Risk Analysis:** Advanced algorithms for risk tolerance and portfolio analysis
